column2: Choose one, or take 1d8 damage instead: You become deathly afraid of whatever you were trying to repel;   You take on a visual characteristic of whatever you were trying to repel, for instance turning your head into a skull if trying to repel skeletons;  You become eternally paranoid that groups of whatever you were trying to repel are constantly stalking and watching you.

One target within 15' that is opposed to you must make a CHA response against the spell check or be frightened of you for 1 round.  Frightened creatures make all rolls against you at -2 and must move at least 5' away from you on their turn.

One target within 30' that is opposed to you must make a  CHA response against the spell check or be frightened of you for 1d4 rounds.  Frightened creatures make all rolls against you at -2 and must move at least 5' away from you on their turn.

Up to two targets within 30' that are opposed to you must make a  CHA response against the spell check or be frightened of you for 1d4 rounds.  Frightened creatures make all rolls against you at -2 and must move at least 5' away from you on their turn.

Up to two targets within 30' that are opposed to you must make a  CHA response against the spell check or be frightened of you for 1d6 rounds.  Frightened creatures make all rolls against you at -3 and must move at least 10' away from you on their turn.

Up to four targets within 30' that are opposed to you must make a  CHA response against the spell check or be frightened of you for 1d8 rounds.  Frightened creatures make all rolls against you at -4 and must move at least 10' away from you on their turn.

Any number of targets within 60' that are opposed to you must make a  CHA response against the spell check or be frightened of you for 1d10 rounds.  Frightened creatures make all rolls against you at -4 and must move at least 10' away from you on their turn.
